original_title: Les artisans de la voix : Les coulisses du doublage français
overview: How do you define dubbing? What characterizes this field?  These actors with golden voices have marked several generations of audiences, in movies, on TV, and even on the Internet. 10 of them have generously accepted to talk about their job as actors specialized in dubbing, their experiences, but also their different points of view.
title: Les artisans de la voix : Les coulisses du doublage français
